channel.title: [PI] Enabling Drops [PI]
channel.description: Monsters do not drop at all on this source, I have my npc.cfg, NPCDrops.cfg, and NpcConstants.cfg coded correctly. Would anyone like to give me any information on what file to edit, how I should edit it, or do whatever to get these drops enabled? I've tryed everything I can think of but it just doesen't work.

item.title: [PI] Enabling Drops [PI]
item.dc:creator: @apathypvp apathypvp
item.description:
@apathypvp wrote:

Monsters do not drop at all on this source, I have my npc.cfg, NPCDrops.cfg, and NpcConstants.cfg coded correctly. Would anyone like to give me any information on what file to edit, how I should edit it, or do whatever to get these drops enabled? I’ve tryed everything I can think of but it just doesen’t work.

Read full topic
